document_data.name: Monster Pit
document_data.mainbody: The '''Monster Pit''' was an arena located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Monster Pit was located in Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] beneath the [[Fishscale Smithy]] and the [[Thirsty Sailor]].
document_data.History: Once owned by [[Elaith Craulnober]], the Monster Pit was abandoned as of the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, though local gangs sometimes met there to settle their differences.
